fields.title: Django Rocks
fields.content: Django makes web development fast and clean.

fields.title: Getting Started with Python
fields.content: Python is a powerful and easy-to-learn language.

fields.title: Understanding Views
fields.content: Views in Django control the logic of your application.

fields.title: Working with Models
fields.content: Models define the structure of your database tables.

fields.title: Admin Interface
fields.content: Django's admin is auto-generated and customizable.

fields.title: Migrations in Django
fields.content: Migrations help you evolve your database schema.

fields.title: Templates and Rendering
fields.content: Templates control how your content is displayed.

fields.title: Routing with URLs
fields.content: URLs map HTTP paths to views in Django.

fields.title: Deploying Django Projects
fields.content: Django can be deployed on many platforms including Heroku and DigitalOcean.
